Sentencas: The performance degradation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is directly related to the damage and fracture of electrode microstructures.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: In this study, the phase field fracture method is used to simulate the fracture of anode microstructures, and the effects of boundary constraints, thermal load, and Ni phase on the fracture of Ni-YSZ anode microstructures are investigated.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: Results show that tensile stresses occur in the Ni and YSZ phases whether above or below the reference temperature.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: The cracks propagate along the direction perpendicular to the first principal stress, showing a brittle fracture characteristic.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: When the microstructure is cooled, all cracks appear in YSZ phase, and almost all cracks initiate at the lowest point of YSZ-pore concave interface.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: When the microstructure is heated, the tensile first principal stress induces few cracks at local positions but will not make the cracks propagate continuously.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: The thermal mismatch between Ni and YSZ is not enough to induce cracks, and the fracture of electrode microstructure is more likely to be caused by external tensile load or the thermal mismatch between anode and electrolyte layers.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method

Sentencas: The presence of Ni increases the stiffness of the microstructure, and solid phase's disconnection reduces the strength of the microstructure.
Titulo: Fracture Simulation of Ni-YSZ Anode Microstructures of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Phase Field Method
